events.name: Conversations: Seeing the Light
events.description:
Seeing the Light
Sat 12 Mar, 2pm – 4.30pm 
Expression Gallery, Level 4
Free, Register at Lobby

Programme
2.00pm- 2.10pm: Introduction by Honor Harger, Executive Director of ArtScience Museum 
2.10pm-3.15pm: Toshiyuki Inoko, Founder of teamLab and Ikkan Sanada, owner of Ikkan Art International
3.15-3.30pm: Q&A session
3.30pm- 3.40pm: BREAK 
3.40pm-4.00pm: Randy Chan, co-curator of i Light Festival 
4.00pm-4.20pm: Shigeki Fujii, Director of Nipek
4.20pm-4.30pm: Q&A session 
4.30pm: End of event

Celebrate the launch of Future World with a unique opportunity to hear teamLab's founder, Toshiyuki Inoko in conversation with gallerist Ikkan Sanada. Reflecting also on teamLab’s commission for i Light Marina Bay, curator Randy Chan and architectural lighting designer Shigeki Fujii will explore the role of contemporary light art in the urban space and discuss how ultra-technologists and digital creatives push the boundaries of how we understand art through these innovative and engaging projects. 

Held in conjunction with i Light Marina Bay.

events.name: Video Recording Training with Michael Cheng for Volunteers at FOSSASIA Summit
events.description:
This special training is designed for FOSSASIA volunteers who will be recording talks/presentations during the FOSSASIA summit. During this session you will learn the basic concepts of video recording, become familiar with different equipment and their usage.  Join FOSSASIA team Volunteer Registration Form Get in the Science Centre Please enter through the Visitor Center. Inform the staff that you are here for FOSSASIA Video Training and proceed to Herschel lab on Level 2 Program  • Intro to digital video camera • Intro to voice recorder & microphone • Videography techniques • Transferring videos to laptop • Screen capture tool  Trainer https://scontent-sin1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xat1/v/t1.0-9/1010402_10152832860702229_3854056704602093765_n.jpg?oh=3dd3a15faf62beed5e046e36efa15975&oe=57939AC4 Michael Cheng - Mike is a full-stack front-end and back-end web developer in PHP/Ruby+Rails and also the founder of Engineers.SG - a not-for-profit community initiative created to help document the Singapore tech and startup scene. Engineers.SG seeks to be the place for anyone to get to know, learn and interact with the Singapore tech community. On the site, you can find a curated list of videos recording of local tech meetups and events. https://engineers.sg/episodes/ 



Links Please allow follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/fossasia FOSSASIA Summit Event Page: http://2016.fossasia.org
events.location: Science Centre, 15 Science Centre Road , Singapore
